definition: see 掛羊頭賣狗肉|挂羊头卖狗肉[gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4]
surname Yang
sheep/goat/CL:頭|头[tou2],隻|只[zhi1]
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
dog/CL:隻|只[zhi1],條|条[tiao2]
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
lit. to hang a sheep's head while selling dog meat (idiom)/fig. to cheat/dishonest advertising/wicked deeds carried out under banner of virtue

definition: lit. to wave a banner as if it were a tiger skin (idiom)/fig. to borrow sb's prestige/to take the name of a great cause as a shield
pinyin: la1 da4 qi2 zuo4 hu3 pi2

definition: to pick up what others say (idiom); to pass off other people's opinions as one's own/to parrot
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)

to swindle
neither fish nor fowl/resembling nothing on earth
old wine in a new bottle (idiom)
crowing like a cock and stealing like a dog (idiom)/bag of tricks/useful talents
lit. a monkey wearing a hat (idiom)/fig. worthless person in imposing attire
cow and famous steed at the same trough (idiom); fig. the common and the great are treated alike
strange tales and absurd arguments (idiom)/unreasonable remarks

hackneyed talk/platitude
